alert.note: Alert for Brown; Door; Kewaunee; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued April 04 at 9:54PM CDT until April 05 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Dense fog will reduce the visibility to less than one quarter mile at times. * WHERE...Brown, Door, Kewaunee, Southern Marinette County and Southern Oconto County Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make travel hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense fog developed over Door County during the evening, and was beginning to form over southern Marinette and southern Oconto counties. The dense fog is expected to expand southwest into into the Green Bay area and Kewaunee county after midnight.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use low-beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance between your vehicle and other vehicles on the road.

area.areaDesc: Brown; Door; Kewaunee; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County
